questions.question_text: "collaboration" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Working together toward a shared goal
questions.example_sentence: The partnership aims to strengthen collaboration between the two companies.
questions.explanation:
協力・共同作業
監査
遅延
不一致

questions.question_text: "mutual" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Shared by two or more parties
questions.example_sentence: The companies expressed mutual interest in developing new technologies together.
questions.explanation:
相互の
法規制
一度だけ
投資関連

questions.question_text: "facilitate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To make a process easier or more efficient
To prevent an agreement from being signed
questions.example_sentence: A dedicated coordinator will help facilitate communication between teams.
questions.explanation:
円滑に進める
妨げる
品質低下
従業員入れ替え

questions.question_text: "compliance" の意味はどれでしょう？
questions.example_sentence: Both companies must ensure compliance with international trade regulations.
questions.explanation:
遵守
予測
宣伝
交渉

questions.question_text: "align" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To match or coordinate goals or actions
To reduce the size of a department
questions.example_sentence: The partnership was formed to align long-term business strategies.
questions.explanation:
一致させる・調整する
縮小
採用
報告書作成
